lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce will seek divine intervention ahead of Sunday's clash with Premier League leaders Leicester City after watching his relegation-threatened side fail to convert dominance into goals last weekend.

headline.print_headline: Allardyce Seeks Hand of God to Upset Leicester's Applecart
headline.main: Allardyce Seeks Hand of God to Upset Leicester's Applecart

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce will seek divine intervention ahead of Sunday's clash with Premier League leaders Leicester City after watching his relegation-threatened side fail to convert dominance into goals last weekend....
